name: Go Down Swinging
description: Whenever you make an attack while your current Endurance is less than half your maximum Endurance, +1d to either the attack roll or damage roll, your choice.

improvements.name: Nothing To Lose
improvements.description: Whenever you make an attack while your current Endurance is less than 1/4 your maximum Endurance, take an additional +1d to either the attack roll or damage roll, your choice.
